title: C/C++ utvecklare till SysPartner i Västerås
description:
**Vill du arbeta med komplex mjukvara i teknikens absoluta framkant?**


Vi söker dig som är en erfaren C/C++ utvecklare och som trivs i miljöer där kvalitet, robusthet och långsiktighet står i fokus. Hos oss får du bidra i utvecklingen av system inom områden som försvar, industri, kommunikation och automation, ofta där tillförlitlighet är avgörande och din kod gör verklig skillnad.  

  

**Din roll**


Som konsult på SysPartner blir du en del av ett erfaret team med stark teknisk kultur. Du arbetar i uppdrag som matchar din kompetens och intresse, ofta i roller som senior utvecklare, tech lead eller systemarkitekt. Du får möjlighet att påverka design, teknikval och lösningsstrategier.

 **Exempel på teknikmiljöer där du kan arbeta:**


* Inbyggda system och realtid (RTOS, embedded Linux, Yocto, QNX)
* Kommunikationsprotokoll och nätverksstackar (CAN, TCP/IP, Ethernet, Modbus)
* Säkerhetskritiska system inom försvar, industri och fordon

Plattformar och middleware i C/C++  
* 

### **Din profil**


Du är en analytisk, strukturerad och prestigelös utvecklare som trivs i tekniskt starka miljöer. Du gillar att förstå hur system fungerar på djupet och arbetar gärna nära hårdvaran för att skapa robusta och effektiva lösningar.

 **Krav:**


* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av utveckling i C och/eller C++
* Förståelse för systemarkitektur och minneshantering
* Erfarenhet av att felsöka och optimera kod på låg nivå
* Flytande svenska och engelska i tal och skrift


**Meriterande:**


* Erfarenhet av kommunikationsprotokoll
* Erfarenhet från säkerhetskritiska system
* Kunskap om Yocto, QNX eller liknande miljöer
* Erfarenhet av testautomation eller skriptning i Python eller Bash
* Bakgrund inom försvar, industri, fordon, energi eller telekom

### **Om SysPartner**


SysPartner är ett teknikdrivet konsultbolag med spets inom systemutveckling, IT-infrastruktur och projektledning. Vi grundades i Linköping 2005 och finns idag även i Stockholm, Västerås och Luleå.


Vi samarbetar med några av Sveriges mest teknikintensiva företag inom försvar, industri, energi och kommunikation, där våra konsulter bidrar i allt från utveckling och arkitektur till infrastruktur och ledning av tekniska projekt.


Hos SysPartner kombineras teknisk höjd med en familjär kultur där vi värnar om gemenskap, omtanke och balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vi tror på frihet under ansvar, långsiktiga relationer och att människor växer i rätt miljö.

title: Digital Designer / Frontend-utvecklare
description:
Vi söker dig som är både kreativ och teknisk. Som har känsla för form, storytelling och detaljer – men också kompetensen att omsätta din design i ren kod. Hos oss på Mild får du en kombinerad roll där du jobbar med såväl koncept och design som frontend- och WordPress-utveckling.


Det här är inte en roll för dig som vill sitta still i ett fack. Det är en roll för dig som vill jobba brett och samtidigt på djupet. Som gillar att driva projekt från ax till limpa och vill göra det tillsammans med ett av Sveriges mest erfarna digitala team.

#### **Det här kommer du att göra**

* Skapa koncept, design och UX för webbplatser, kampanjer och digitala gränssnitt.
* Utveckla kompletta WordPress-webbplatser från grunden – både frontend och backend.
* Bygga användarflöden, wireframes och UI-komponenter i Figma.
* Ta fram design för banners, sociala medier och kampanjmaterial.
* Jobba nära projektledare, utvecklare och kreatörer för att forma starka digitala upplevelser.


Det här är en kombinerad roll där du förväntas ta både design- och utvecklingsansvar. Du behöver alltså vara lika trygg i dina visuella beslut som i att skriva kod.

#### **Det här tror vi att du har med dig**

* Minst 5 års byråerfarenhet – du är van att jobba i flera parallella projekt och hantera snabba svängar.
* En stark portfolio med fokus på digital design, UX och webb.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i Figma och Adobe Creative Cloud.
* Gedigen erfarenhet av HTML, CSS och JavaScript samt vana att jobba med moderna ramverk och verktyg. Det är ett plus om du har jobbat med React och Tailwind, även om det inte är ett krav.
* Trygg i backend och van att arbeta direkt i WordPress – du kan bygga egna teman från grunden.
* Ett öga för storytelling, bildval, video, copy, tajming och komposition – du förstår hur allt hänger ihop i en digital upplevelse, även om du inte producerar allt själv.
* Förmåga att arbeta strukturerat, leverera hög kvalitet och ta ansvar i projekt.


Bonuspoäng om du är nyfiken på nya verktyg och AI i design- och utvecklingsprocessen. Det är vi.

#### **Vad du får hos oss**


Hos oss på Mild blir du en del av ett team där vi hjälps åt, utvecklas tillsammans och har kul på vägen. Vi jobbar nära våra kunder och varandra – och du får möjlighet att påverka både arbetssätt, uttryck och resultat. Vår ambition är att du inte ska känna någon söndagsångest. Hos oss ska du ha kul, växa, utvecklas och bidra, ta fullt ansvar för ditt jobb och samtidigt känna att du har hela teamet och bolaget bakom dig.


Förutom en härlig arbetsplats med trevliga kollegor så erbjuder vi självklart även en bra lön, flexibla arbetstider, tjänstepension och friskvårdsbidrag.


Vi kör en hybridmodell för distansarbete – 5 dagar i månaden kan du jobba från valfri plats, resten av tiden ses vi på kontoret.

**Vi erbjuder dig:**

* En trygg anställning med konkurrenskraftig lön
* Flexibla arbetstider
* Personlig utbildningsplan – framtagen med din teamleader
* Tjänstepension och friskvårdsbidrag


Och framför allt – riktigt roliga projekt, med kunder som vill framåt.

#### **Är det dig vi beskriver?**


Skicka in ditt CV, en kort presentation och portfolio med digitala projekt du är stolt över. Vi intervjuar löpande, så vänta inte för länge.


Välkommen med din ansökan!

title: .Net utvecklare med 5 års erfarenhet
description:
Hos oss får du arbeta i ett team som moderniserar och vidareutvecklar centrala delar av svensk infrastruktur. Du blir del av en samhällsviktig miljö där tillförlitlighet, prestanda och säkerhet står i centrum.


Vi söker nu en systemutvecklare inom .NET som vill bidra till både nyutveckling och förvaltning av det migrerade stordatorsystemet för vägtrafikregistret.

### **Ditt uppdrag i praktiken:**

* Arbeta i ett agilt team (6–8 personer) inom produktområdet Person och Intressent.
* Utveckla och förvalta systemlösningar i .NET-plattformen, med fokus på backend.
* Hantera incidenter och ge 2:a linjens användarstöd.
* Delta i planering, design och utveckling av robusta och långsiktiga lösningar.
* Samarbeta med verksamhet och andra team för att skapa hållbara och effektiva systemflöden.


### **Vi söker dig som:**

* Har minst 4 års erfarenhet av systemutveckling inom .NET.
* Har minst 4 års erfarenhet av C#.
* Har minst 4 års erfarenhet av arbete med SQL Server.
* Har minst 2 års erfarenhet av arbete enligt agila metoder.
* Har utbildning i Asyscos ramverk AMT samt minst 4 års erfarenhet av utveckling på plattformen (inom de senaste 8 åren).
* Har erfarenhet av Microsoft Team Foundation Server eller Azure DevOps Server.
* Kommunicerar obehindrat på svenska i tal och skrift.
* Kan genomgå säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll och godkänna säkerhetsskyddsavtal.

  


### **Meriterande erfarenheter:**

* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av uppdrag inom offentlig sektor.
* Erfarenhet av arbete i verksamheter där säkerhetskänslig data hanteras.

 **Varför vi tror att du kommer trivas:**


Du blir del av ett långsiktigt uppdrag där din kompetens bidrar direkt till samhällsnytta. Här får du arbeta med modern teknik i en trygg miljö, där samarbete, kvalitet och utveckling står i fokus.

title: D365 Commerce developer - Gothenburg
description:
**About Justera Group**  

Justera Group AB is a leading Swedish IT consulting firm with great experience specializing in building high-performing technology teams and delivering end-to-end IT solutions. Led by dynamic female executives, Justera Group focuses on helping businesses harness the power of digital technologies to continuously evolve in today’s rapidly changing economy. The company has deep expertise in IT consultancy, software development, and recruitment services, providing clients with purpose-driven, well-trained consultants who consistently deliver efficient and effective results. Justera Group manages the entire talent lifecycle, from hiring to ongoing management, ensuring the right fit for each project on time and within budget. With their strong commitment to quality, collaboration, and client success, Justera Group is a trusted partner for technology innovation across Sweden.  

  

**About the Role:**  

We are looking for a skilled Microsoft Dynamics 365 Commerce Developer to join a dynamic development team supporting the transformation of a large-scale retail operations platform. The project focuses on replacing legacy ERP systems with a modern Microsoft Dynamics 365-based solution, including modules such as Commerce, Finance & Operations, Customer Service, and Field Service.

**Key Responsibilities:**

  

* Develop and customize components in D365 Commerce, including frontend, backend, APIs, and data layers
* Create custom modules, themes, and RCSU extensions to meet specific business requirements
* Integrate D365 Commerce with external systems (e.g., payment, search, ERP platforms)
* Collaborate in an Agile team to deliver features from design through deployment
* Build and maintain CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps and GitHub
* Document technical solutions and contribute to internal development standards
* Support rollout and onboarding through knowledge sharing and training
* 

**Requirements:**

* D365 Modules: Commerce, Finance & Operations, CRM, Field Service
* Full-Stack Development: Frontend, backend, APIs, databases
* ERP Integration: Experience integrating D365 with AX2009 and third-party systems
* Custom Development: Modules, themes, RCSU extensions
* DevOps & CI/CD: Azure DevOps, GitHub, build and release pipelines
* Cloud: Microsoft Azure
* Soft Skills: Agile collaboration, documentation, training support
* 

**What We Offer:**

  

* A dynamic and innovative workplace driving advancements in cutting-edge robotic technologies
* The opportunity to collaborate with talented cross-functional teams on meaningful and impactful projects
* Competitive compensation and comprehensive benefits package
* A supportive culture that fosters continuous learning, growth, and professional development
* Flexible hybrid working model for an optimal work-life balance
* 25 days of annual leave to recharge and relax
* An annual wellness allowance of 3,500 SEK to support your health and wellbeing

title: Integration Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Job Description**

  

* Develop and deploy a microservice in AWS Kubernetes to serve as a shim layer between a customer engagement platform and an AI service.
* Implement the logic required to manage real-time communication and routing between platforms.
* Design and expose API endpoints, handle streaming events, and ensure low-latency performance.
* Ensure secure data handling, including authentication, authorization, and compliance requirements.
* Optimize for scalability, resilience, and observability in a real-time interaction context.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code following best practices.
* Collaborate with architects and platform engineers to ensure seamless deployment and integration.
* Document the microservice architecture, design patterns, and operational runbooks.

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* Strong background in microservice/backend development (Java, Node.js, Python, or similar).
* Proven experience deploying applications in Kubernetes (EKS, Helm, operators, manifests, CI/CD pipelines).
* Hands-on experience with AWS services (EKS, API Gateway, CloudWatch, IAM, etc.).
* Familiarity with Azure-hosted AI services and APIs.
* Experience with event-driven architecture and real-time APIs (WebSocket, streaming, gRPC, etc.).
* Solid understanding of cloud security, data protection, and compliance best practices.
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently.

title: Software Developer
description:
**Join Ascom Sweden** as a Software Developer – and help Shape the Future of Critical Communication!


*At Ascom,* we’re on a mission to develop the next generation of infrastructure for our paging and personal alarm systems. We’re looking for a passionate **Embedded** Software Developer to join us as a consultant and help build innovative transmitters and receivers for the UHF band. If you thrive in a collaborative, high-impact environment and want to make a real difference, this is your opportunity!


The position is a full-time, fixed-term role, with an expected duration of approximately 2 years. You’ll be based at our **Gothenburg office**, working hands-on with cutting-edge technology and a passionate team.


**Your Key Responsibilities**


* Develop embedded software for new infrastructure products
* Program low-level drivers and data communication (I2C, SPI)
* Work with real-time operating systems (e.g., FreeRTOS) and multitasking/inter-process communication
* Develop software for data communication over TCP/IP, including security protocols
* Collaborate with hardware teams and cross-functional stakeholders

**What You Bring**


* Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science or related field
* 4+ years’ experience in object-oriented C++ development for embedded systems
* Several years’ experience with real-time OS, multitasking, and inter-process communication
* Strong background in low-level C/C++ development for drivers and data communication
* Experience with TCP/IP and data security protocols
* Solid hardware knowledge
* Proficiency in GCC, GIT, Docker, Jenkins, CMake
* Excellent English skills (spoken and written)
* Ability to converse in Swedish

**Who You Are**


* A strong team player with excellent interpersonal and communication skills
* Solution-oriented, driven, and committed
* Analytical, structured, and quick to learn
* Flexible mindset

**Why Ascom?**


*At Ascom,* you’ll be part of a dynamic team driving innovation and you’ll get to work on meaningful projects that impact safety and communication.


**Ready to take the next step in your career? Apply now and help us shape the future of** Innovation at Ascom!
company_description: Ascom is a global solutions provider focused on Healthcare Information and Communication Technology (ICT) and mobile workflow solutions.

title: Fullstackutvecklare
description:
Är du en nyfiken och driven utvecklare med några års erfarenhet som vill jobba i projekt tillsammans med ett tight team? Vill du vara med och bygga digitala lösningar som gör verklig skillnad? Då kan du vara den vi söker!  

  

**Om rollen**  

  

Som **fullstackutvecklare** på Knowit Experience är du en viktig del av våra helhetsåtaganden inom webb och e-handel. Du arbetar med allt från funktionella anpassningar till integrationer mellan system i våra webb- och e-handelsprojekt. Hos oss är **samarbete nyckeln till framgång** – du kommer att jobba i agila och tvärfunktionella inhouse-team där du har nära dialog med projektledare, UX-designers, analytiker, testare och andra utvecklare.


Varje projekt är unikt, vilket gör att vi söker dig med **bred teknisk kompetens och en lösningsorienterad inställning**. Du trivs med att ta ansvar, arbeta kundnära och vara en del av ett team där vi hjälps åt och lyfter varandra.

**Vem är du?**


Vi tror att du har **5–10 års erfarenhet** av en liknande roll, gärna som konsult eller på en byrå, där du har varit delaktig i flera kundprojekt.

  

* Erfarenhet av **.NET/C#, JavaScript/TypeScript och React**.
* Kunskap om moderna webb- och e-handelsplattformar samt systemintegrationer.
* Förståelse för **tillgänglighet, prestanda och säkerhet** i digitala lösningar.
* Erfarenhet av versionshantering och CI/CD-flöden.

**Meriterande:**

* Erfarenhet av **agil utvecklingsmetodik**.
* Kunskap inom **Optimizely, Umbraco eller andra CMS/plattformar**.
* Erfarenhet av DevOps, molntjänster och containerteknik som Docker.
  

**Vad vi erbjuder:**

* Hos oss får du:
* + Möjlighet att arbeta både inhouse och i expertuppdrag med ett tight, agilt och tvärfunktionellt team.
	+ En roll där du kan växa och skapa din framtid i en miljö som värdesätter initiativ och kompetensutveckling.
	+ Möjlighet att leda helhetsåtaganden inom webb och e-handel och utveckla långsiktiga partnerskap med våra kunder.
	+ Tillgång till ett inspirerande nätverk med närmare 350 kollegor inom Experience.
	+ En trygg anställning med kollektivavtal, generösa och proaktiva hälso- och friskvårdsupplägg samt pensions- och försäkringsförmåner.
	+ En arbetsplats som värdesätter balans mellan arbete och fritid samt aktivt arbetar med jämställdhet, miljö och hållbarhet.

**Ansökan**  

  

Låter detta som du? Då vill vi gärna höra från dig! Har du frågor om rollen eller om oss på Knowit? Tveka inte att kontakta **S****andra Skilberg.**


Vi ser fram emot att träffa dig!

title: Backendutvecklare
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**

  

* Hög kompetens av Java version 17 - 21.
* Hög kompetens inom versionshantering med hjälp av till exempel Git.
* Hög kompetens inom beroendehantering med hjälp av Maven eller Gradle
* Hög kompetens inom skapande och förvaltning av relationella databaser, till exempel Oracle eller Postgres SQL
* Hög kompetens inom continuous integration och delivery, både relevanta verktyg samt concept.
* Kompetens inom driftsättning av applikationer i en cloud- klustermiljö, till exempel Kubernetes, Openshift eller AWS ECS
* Kompetens inom grundläggande containerteknik t.ex docker eller podman
* Minst åtta års erfarenhet av systemutveckling.

  

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 17-10-2025 **Om Oss**  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Här påverkar du din egen lön som helt och hållet som baseras på ditt timpris mot kund.


Vår lönemodell är en hybridlösning mellan en fast månadslön och en provisionsbaserad ersättning. Det innebär att din månadslön baseras på ditt timpris, fast om du mot förmodan skulle stå utan uppdrag så behåller du en grund lön fram tills vi hittat ett nytt uppdrag, bra va?

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?  

  

*Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Senior Software Developer with Node.js
description:
**Do you have a passion for clean code and scalable solutions?**


Are you eager to grow as a developer while working on cutting-edge technology in the fast-growing EV sector? Join Virta, Europe’s innovation leader in electric vehicle charging, and help us build the future of sustainable mobility.


**About Us**


Virta is Europe’s fastest-growing EV charging platform, operating in 36+ countries with 600,000+ charging stations. Headquartered in Helsinki, with offices in Berlin, Stockholm, Paris, Singapore, and Bucharest, we’re shaping the future of e-mobility with a talented, multinational team.


Virta recently acquired Swedish fleet charging management leader Northe and together we’re building the future of electric fleet mobility. Northe platform empowers both drivers and fleet managers with seamless EV charging and mobility solutions, from an intuitive mobile app to powerful web-based fleet management tools. As we grow, we’re looking for a Senior Software Developer with Node.js to join our team in Sweden.


**The role**


This position is backend-focused, but experience with React is valuable as you’ll occasionally collaborate on our frontend applications and ensure smooth integration between backend services and user interfaces.


You’ll be working on scalable APIs, integrations with EV charging networks, payment systems, and data flows that power Northe’s core platform. As part of a cross-functional team, you’ll help us deliver reliable, high-performing services to support thousands of charging points and users across the region.


**What You’ll Do**

* Design, develop, and maintain backend services and APIs using Node.js, Express, and TypeScript.
* Work with PostgreSQL for reliable, scalable data storage and querying.
* Build integrations with external EV charging infrastructure providers and payment systems.
* Ensure system scalability, performance, and resilience for real-time charging data and transactions.
* Collaborate with frontend engineers on API contracts and occasionally contribute to React-based applications.
* Write high-quality, testable code and contribute to our CI/CD and DevOps workflows.
* Participate in architecture discussions, code reviews, and technical decision-making.
* Deploy and manage infrastructure on AWS using Terraform.
* Troubleshoot, monitor, and improve production systems in collaboration with the DevOps team.

**What We’re Looking For**

* 3+ years of professional experience in backend development with Node.js (TypeScript preferred).
* Solid understanding of Express, RESTful API design, and database technologies (PostgreSQL).
* Hands-on experience with AWS (e.g., ECS, Lambda, S3, RDS) and Terraform.
* Familiarity with frontend development in React (not your main focus, but enough to collaborate effectively).
* Strong knowledge of modern development practices (CI/CD, automated testing, code reviews).
* Excellent problem-solving skills and ability to work in a fast-paced, scaling environment.
* Good communication skills in English.
* Please note: Only candidates with current residency in Sweden will be considered for this role.

**Nice to Have:**


* Experience in the EV charging, mobility, or energy sector.
* Knowledge of event-driven architectures (e.g., Kafka, RabbitMQ, SNS/SQS).
* Exposure to Docker and Kubernetes.
Familiarity with payment processing or IoT integrations.  
* 

**Why Join Us**


* Work on meaningful products shaping the future of electric mobility
* Collaborate with an international, passionate, and supportive team
* Hybrid work with autonomy and flexibility
* Opportunities for professional growth in a fast-scaling company

**Ready to join us?**


Submit your application and help us build the future of EV charging—while having fun along the way!


**Facts & Figures about Virta**

* Virta is Europe’s fastest growing electric vehicle charging platform
* One of the leading global EV charging platforms and charging networks in Europe
* Virta is among the rare 65 companies that made the FT 1000 list four consecutive times.
* 30+ countries with charging networks on the Virta platform
* Headquarters: Helsinki, Finland
* Offices: Berlin, Stockholm, Paris, Singapore, Bucharest
* 200+ employees
* 600 000+ charging points in the roaming network

title: C/C++ utvecklare
description:
Brinner du för säkerhetskritiska system? Bli Embeddedutvecklare på ett ledande teknikbolag i Göteborg! ️

**Om företaget:**


Hos vår kund blir du en del av ett dynamiskt team på ett av Nordens största teknikkonsultföretag, där du får möjlighet att arbeta med både nischade och varierande projekt. Din roll kan skräddarsys efter dina styrkor och ambitioner, och du får arbeta med teknik som gör verklig skillnad – företaget verkar globalt med huvudkontor i Sverige och bidrar till att stärka flera nationers försvarsförmåga. Som konsult får du också erfarenhet från olika branscher, såsom industri, försvar, medtech, fordon och telekom, vilket ger en bred och stimulerande karriär.


Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Futuria People men du kommer anställas direkt hos kund.

**Om rollen:**


Det här är en bred och viktig roll där du blir spindeln i nätet på kontoret – du utvecklar och implementerar mjukvara för inbyggda system i säkerhetskritiska miljöer. Rollen kan även inkludera försvarsrelaterade projekt, support och problemlösning. Möjlighet finns för rätt person att ta nästa steg som teamledare, produktägare eller Scrum Master.


Du kommer bland annat att:

* Utveckla mjukvara för inbyggda system i säkerhetskritiska miljöer
* Stötta teamet med problemlösning och integration
* Arbeta i team med fokus på samarbete och kunskapsdelning

**Du erbjuds:**

  

* **Spännande och varierande projekt** – Arbeta inom flera branscher och tekniker med fokus på hållbara och säkra lösningar.
* **Skräddarsydd roll** – Din tjänst anpassas efter dina kunskaper, intressen och karriärmål.
* **Karriärutveckling** – Möjlighet att växa inom företaget, exempelvis som teamledare eller specialist.
* **Hållbar arbetsmiljö** – Balans mellan arbete och privatliv med fokus på långsiktig utveckling.
* **Lärande och innovation** – Teknik-kvällar och workshops där du får bygga system och utveckla nya lösningar.
* **Påverkan på kultur och processer** – Var med och forma företagets arbetsmiljö och samarbetsklimat.
* **Teamkänsla i fokus** – Social och relationsbyggande arbetsmiljö med stort fokus på samarbete.
  

**Vi ser gärna att du:**


Som person är du flexibel och anpassningsbar – kanske har du tidigare erfarenhet som konsult eller en naturlig fallenhet för att arbeta i konsultliknande miljöer. Du har ett genuint intresse för att arbeta med säkerhetskritiska system och vill vara med och skapa robusta, högkvalitativa lösningar.

  


Vi ser gärna att du har:

* En relevant kandidatexamen inom datavetenskap, elektronik, mekatronik eller liknande.
* 3,5–5 års erfarenhet av mjukvaruutveckling för inbyggda system.
* God kunskap i programmering med C och/eller C++.

  

*Det är också meriterande om du har erfarenhet av Linux-miljöer, kunskap om versions- och automationsverktyg som Git, eller om du har en masterexamen eller civilingenjörsexamen.*

  


  

**Övrig information**

* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Omfattning: Heltid
* Placering: Göteborg
* Eventuella frågor besvaras av rekryteringskonsult Ebba Strömberg:
* ebba.stromberg@futuriapeople.se


Passar det här in på dig eller känner du någon som skulle passa bättre för jobbet? - Tipsa gärna!


Intervjuer sker löpande, välkommen med din ansökan idag!

***Futuria People*** *är rekryteringsföretaget som hjälper individer att ta nästa steg i sin karriär och företag att attrahera nya medarbetare. Genom uppsökande rekrytering och kvalitativ annonsering har vi hjälpt hundratals kandidater till ett nytt jobb och en mer stimulerande vardag.*

title: Senior Android Developer
description:
We now have a new requirement and are looking for a consultant colleague with the qualifications listed below. The position is part of our consulting business, which means you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments.

*As part of your application, you may be presented to clients/partners as part of the recruitment process. If selected for the assignment, you will be employed by us and work either with clients or on internal projects and assignments as part of our consulting business.*  

  

**Your Profile (Must-have requirements)**

  

* Several years of experience as an Android Developer
* Solid knowledge of Kotlin
* Hands-on experience with Jetpack Compose
* Experience with GraphQL
* Experience and genuine interest in Test-Driven Development
* A communicative, open-minded personality with a drive to take ownership
* Curiosity and eagerness to try new ways of working

  

  

  

  

**Application deadline:** 13-10-2025  


  

**About Us**  

We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.  

  

Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?  

  

We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.


A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.


Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.


Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.


Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?


Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.


Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.


Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Senior Integration Developer
description:
We are looking for a **Senior Integration Developer** for a global telecom company in **Stockholm.**

**Start is ASAP, 1 year's contract to begin with, possibility of extension after that.**

  

We are seeking a skilled Senior Integration Developer to design and build a microservice that will act as a shim layer between Genesys Cloud, a customer experience platform, and an external AI service. This microservice will run in a Kubernetes-based PaaS environment hosted in AWS and integrate with AI services hosted in Azure. The developer will be hands-on in building, testing, and deploying this integration layer, ensuring it is reliable, scalable, and secure.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop and deploy a microservice in AWS Kubernetes to serve as a shim layer between a customer engagement platform and an AI service.
* Implement the logic required to manage real-time communication and routing between platforms.
* Design and expose API endpoints, handle streaming events, and ensure low-latency performance.
* Ensure secure data handling, including authentication, authorization, and compliance requirements.
* Optimize for scalability, resilience, and observability in a real-time interaction context.
* Write clean, testable, and maintainable code following best practices.
* Collaborate with architects and platform engineers to ensure seamless deployment and integration.
* Document the microservice architecture, design patterns, and operational runbooks.

**Preferred Skills & Experience:**

* Strong background in microservice/backend development (Java, Node.js, Python, or similar).
* Proven experience deploying applications in Kubernetes (EKS, Helm, operators, manifests, CI/CD pipelines).
* Hands-on experience with AWS services (EKS, API Gateway, CloudWatch, IAM, etc.).
* Familiarity with Azure-hosted AI services and APIs.
* Experience with event-driven architecture and real-time APIs (WebSocket, streaming, gRPC, etc.).
* Solid understanding of cloud security, data protection, and compliance best practices.
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work independently.


This is a full-time consultant position through Incluso in Stockholm (Hybrid). Start is ASAP, 1 year's contract to begin with, possibility of extension after that.


Please submit your CV as soon as possible since we will review the applications on an on-going basis.


For more information about this role, please contact Kanika Singhal, recruiter at Incluso.

title: Senior R&D Engineer - Software developer
description:
**Description**


**The opportunity**  

Join our team in the development of the real-time, high-performance control system platform MACH (Modular Advanced Control for HVDC and FACTS). Over 60 years ago, Hitachi Energy introduced a new way of transmitting electricity across long distances with minimum losses – High Voltage Direct Current (HVDC). HVDC technology can now deliver up to 12 gigawatts of power at voltage levels of up to 1,100 kV, covering distances of more than 3,000 kilometers.


You will be part of the product group HVDC within Hitachi Energy in Ludvika/Västerås. The MACH platform is needed to connect o shore wind power, create synthetic inertia, connect energy systems over long distances and create a robust electricity grid prepared for the future. We o er an exciting job in an international environment where you will get great possibilities to develop further within Hitachi Energy.


We are looking for a software developer with 5-7 years of experience of software and system design. In our team, you will be working in experienced and knowledgeable cross-functional teams in an agile setup.

**How you’ll make an impact**

* Being involved in pre-study, design and development of cutting-edge technologies that enable the current and next generation of modular advanced control for HVDC (MACH).
* Developing and maintaining the MACH platform together with your highly competent colleagues.
* Working in one of several agile cross-functional teams (set up according to SAFe methodology).
* Further helping to develop the team's skills within the areas of eldbus communication, real-time operating systems, computer architecture, both by taking part in, and contributing to, our great talent pool.
* Working jointly with your team members to solve problems and find new solutions.
* Working closely with both internal and external customers in our projects.
* As an employee of Hitachi Energy you will be living Hitachi Energy's core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.

**Your background**

* A M.Sc. or a B.Sc within Electrical/Electronics Engineering, Computer Science or
* similar eld.
* Solid experience in C/C++ and knowledge in C#.
* You have a genuine interest in computers, programming and new technologies
* combined with experience from similar work.
* Good understanding of embedded technologies- digital signal processing, real-time
* operating systems and/or multi-core systems Experience in eldbus communication
* protocols such as EtherCAT, CAN 2.0, CANopen, HDLC, TDM.
* Experience in debugging and root cause analysis of problems related to the above
* technologies.
* Experience in scripting languages like Python is an added advantage.

**What we offer**

* Collective agreement
* Flexible working time
* Health care and wellness allowance
* Fantastic career possibilities within Hitachi Energy both within Sweden and globally
* Mentor to support you throughout onboard phase
* Various trainings and education supporting employee development
* Diversified company with over 70+ nationalities working in Sweden
* Supplementary compensation for parental leave
* Employee Benefit Portal with thousands of discounts and perks

**More about us**


Are you ready for a new exciting challenge? Does the above description sound like you? Applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis, so don’t delay – apply today!


Recruiting Manager Samarth Deo, samarth.deo@hitachienergy.com, will answer your questions about the position. Union representatives – Sveriges Ingenjörer: Mikael Hjort, +46 107-38 29 86; Ledarna: Frank Hollstedt, +46 107-38 70 43; Unionen: Fredrik Holmgren, +46 107-38 21 85. All other questions can be directed to Talent Acquisition Gustaf Hedström, gustaf.hedstrom@hitachienergy.com

**Qualified individuals with a disability may request a reasonable accommodation if you are unable or limited in your ability to use or access the Hitachi Energy career site as a result of your disability. You may request reasonable accommodations by completing a** **general inquiry form** **on our website. Please include your contact information and specific details about your required accommodation to support you during the job application process.**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**This is solely for job seekers with disabilities requiring accessibility assistance or an accommodation in the job application process. Messages left for other purposes will not receive a response.**

* Being involved in pre-study, design and development of cutting-edge technologies that enable the current and next generation of modular advanced control for HVDC (MACH).
* Developing and maintaining the MACH platform together with your highly competent colleagues.
* Working in one of several agile cross-functional teams (set up according to SAFe methodology).
* Further helping to develop the team's skills within the areas of eldbus communication, real-time operating systems, computer architecture, both by taking part in, and contributing to, our great talent pool.
* Working jointly with your team members to solve problems and find new solutions.
* Working closely with both internal and external customers in our projects.
* As an employee of Hitachi Energy you will be living Hitachi Energy's core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.

**Your background**

* A M.Sc. or a B.Sc within Electrical/Electronics Engineering, Computer Science or
* similar eld.
* Solid experience in C/C++ and knowledge in C#.
* You have a genuine interest in computers, programming and new technologies
* combined with experience from similar work.
* Good understanding of embedded technologies- digital signal processing, real-time
* operating systems and/or multi-core systems Experience in eldbus communication
* protocols such as EtherCAT, CAN 2.0, CANopen, HDLC, TDM.
* Experience in debugging and root cause analysis of problems related to the above
* technologies.
* Experience in scripting languages like Python is an added advantage.

**What we offer**

* Collective agreement
* Flexible working time
* Health care and wellness allowance
* Fantastic career possibilities within Hitachi Energy both within Sweden and globally
* Mentor to support you throughout onboard phase
* Various trainings and education supporting employee development
* Diversified company with over 70+ nationalities working in Sweden
* Supplementary compensation for parental leave
* Employee Benefit Portal with thousands of discounts and perks

**More about us**


Are you ready for a new exciting challenge? Does the above description sound like you? Applications will be reviewed on an ongoing basis, so don’t delay – apply today!


Recruiting Manager Samarth Deo, samarth.deo@hitachienergy.com, will answer your questions about the position. title: iOS Developer
description:
**The Company**


PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.

  

We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.

  

We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.

  

Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.


Job Description Summary: We are looking for an iOS Developer to join the Business Experience area who are responsible for creating fantastic payment experiences for our business users and their customers, we serve millions of customers. We work as an Agile team and like to deliver small high quality increments regularly for our customers. We are welcoming to new team members and are here to support your learning journey in ways that suit you. This is an exciting opportunity to work on interesting problems together with talented peers in a cross-functional agile team. You will create modern digital products that affect people’s lives for the better within PayPal globally.


Job Description:


**Essential Responsibilities:**

* Delivers complete solutions spanning all phases of the Software Development Lifecycle (SDLC) (design, implementation, testing, delivery and operations), based on definitions from more senior roles.
* Advises immediate management on project-level issues
* Guides junior engineers
* Operates with little day-to-day supervision, making technical decisions based on knowledge of internal conventions and industry best practices
* Applies knowledge of technical best practices in making decisions

**Expected Qualifications:**

* 3+ years relevant experience and a Bachelor’s degree OR Any equivalent combination of education and experience.


Additional\_Responsibilities\_And\_Preferred\_Qualifications:


* Good experience in iOS development, with good knowledge of Swift.
* Familiarity with iOS SDK, SwiftUI and various Apple's frameworks and understand how to leverage them effectively to build robust iOS applications.
* Understanding of common architectural patterns such as MVVM (Model-View-ViewModel).
* Familiarity with CI/CD pipelines and automation tools like Jenkins or Fastlane to streamline the build, test, and deployment process.
* Commitment to writing clean, maintainable code with a focus on code quality and experience with unit testing, integration testing, and UI testing.
* Keen interest in keeping up to date with the latest technological development.
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English.


PayPal does not charge candidates any fees for courses, applications, resume reviews, interviews, background checks, or onboarding. Any such request is a red flag and likely part of a scam. To learn more about how to identify and avoid recruitment fraud please visit https://careers.pypl.com/contact-us.


For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.

 **Our Benefits:**


At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset-you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.


We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com  



  

**Who We Are:**


To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx  



  

**Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**


PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.


**Belonging at PayPal:**


Our employees are central to advancing our mission, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can do their best work with a sense of purpose and belonging. Belonging at PayPal means creating a workplace with a sense of acceptance and security where all employees feel included and valued. We are proud to have a diverse workforce reflective of the merchants, consumers, and communities that we serve, and we continue to take tangible actions to cultivate inclusivity and belonging at PayPal.

  

Any general requests for consideration of your skills, please Join our Talent Community.

  

We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply.

title: Automotive Embedded C/C++ Developer
description:
*Are you a talented C/C++ developer seeking your next opportunity? Join the Embedded Systems department in Stockholm, where exciting challenges await!*  

The ALTEN Stockholm office is home to a dynamic, highly skilled team of engineers and developers from all over the world who specialize in delivering tailored solutions across sectors like automotive, telecommunications, life sciences, and IT. Known for their collaborative spirit, the team combines deep technical expertise with a proactive, problem-solving approach, fostering an environment where creativity and efficiency meet to drive impactful results for clients. With a strong focus on professional development and a supportive culture, the Stockholm team is dedicated to both individual growth and collective success, making it an exciting and empowering place to be a part of.

**WHAT WE OFFER YOU**

  

Every employee is equally valuable in the success of ALTEN! We believe in growing together by offering opportunities, development and togetherness.


ALTEN operates in several different industries, having a wide variety of assignments, coaching managers and training through ALTEN Academy, which means that it will always be possible to develop at ALTEN. Your wishes will guide your way forward.


 As a consultant, you will get the genuine team feeling at your assignment but also a wonderful togetherness at ALTEN. Through our different internal networks, such as Women@ALTEN and ALTEN Sports you will get the opportunity to drive topics and activities that are close to your heart. At ALTEN, we think it’s important to have a balance between work and spare time, which is why we offer three extra days off a year. We have a collective agreement and offer benefits like pension, insurances and wellness grants.



**WHAT YOU WILL DO**

**Design and Develop**: Create high-quality, real-time embedded software solutions in C++ for various industries.  

**Innovate**: Work on the latest technologies such as IoT, AI, and autonomous systems, contributing to exciting projects that shape the future.  

**Collaborate**: Join forces with talented engineers across multiple disciplines to deliver state-of-the-art products and systems.  

**Problem Solve**: Tackle technical challenges with creativity and out-of-the-box thinking, ensuring optimal performance and reliability.  

**Grow**: Expand your knowledge through ongoing training, support, and career development within a dynamic, international environment.

**WHO ARE YOU**

* 3+ years in Embedded C/C++ software development within the automotive industry.
* Strong proficiency in real-time systems, and embedded platforms (ARM, FPGA, etc.).
* Python.
* Bash.
* Jenkins.
* Classic or Adaptive AUTOSAR.
* Degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or related field.
* Meritorius: experience of Yocto and Buildroot as well as with microcontrollers

**ABOUT ALTEN**


ALTEN is one of Europe’s largest technology and IT consulting companies with over 57,000 employees in nearly 30 countries. Our engineers carry out complex and highly technical projects throughout the value chain of the most prestigious companies in all sectors, such as Automotive, Defense, Energy & Environment, Industry, Public services & Government and Life Sciences. In Sweden, we are about 1300 committed employees with 9 offices in 9 cities – from Lund in the south to Skellefteå in the north. For the fifth year in a row, ALTEN has been named one of Sweden’s most attractive employers by Karriärföretagen, an award for employers that offer unique career and development opportunities.

title: Fullstack Developer for Product & Platform Engineering
description:
***Are you passionate about building and growing impactful products in a collaborative and innovative environment? Join our growing team as a full-stack developer in Stockholm, where you'll work on a strategic core product, using technologies like C#/.NET Core and cloud solutions in Azure and/or AWS and be a part of a talented team that values growth and innovation!***

**This is what makes the position as Full Stack Developer unique**

* Play a key role in shaping a strategic product that drives the company's success.
* Take ownership of an evolving product with opportunities for continuous development and innovation.
* Collaborate with a talented and supportive team that values growth and teamwork.


The hiring manager for this role is **Jelena Falatov****, Manager, Portals, Product****& Pricing**. As a leader, she is committed to creating an environment where people can do their best work, supporting both personal and professional growth, leading with empathy, and fostering a culture that is open, supportive, and inspiring, while still providing the right challenges to help every team member thrive.

***Read more about Dustin here***

**Your role & influence as Full Stack Developer**

***Responsibility*****:** In this role, you’ll play a key part in full-stack development within a collaborative, cross-functional team, helping shape and grow a strategic product that directly impacts our business.


You’ll work across the stack from back-end services and APIs to front-end interfaces with a strong focus on back-end systems design, integration, and messaging architecture in high-volume, transaction-heavy environments. This is an opportunity to deepen your expertise while building products at scale in a supportive, innovative team culture.

***Collaboration*****:** Together with your small but growing team, you take care of building, maintaining, and developing a core product, collaborating closely not only with your immediate team members but also with the Product & Platform Engineering department.

 ***Core activities:***

* **Build impactful products** – take ownership in developing and maintaining the core platform that powers our success.


* **Drive innovation** – continuously enhance and evolve the product, shaping its future with fresh ideas, improvements, and focus on automation with AI tooling.

  

* **Thrive together** – collaborate in a supportive, team-driven environment where every win is shared.

  

**Benefits of joining Dustin**  

  

We believe there's more to Dustin than just the benefits listed here. You'll fully understand this once you're with us. Curious? Our Life at Dustin - Dustin Sweden page has you covered.

**You can find more on our benefits below in the vacancy.**

**This is what we imagine you bring**


We’re looking for a curious, open-minded problem-solver with a strong team spirit and a passion for continuous learning. You bring around 3-5 years of hands-on experience with C#, .NET, Kubernetes and REST APIs, building and improving products. You’re confident designing distributed systems and working with SQL databases and cloud platforms: Azure or AWS.

*Additionally, it'll be nice to see that you have experience with:*

* Continuous Delivery mindset & CI/CD pipelines
* Azure ServiceBus & Functions
* Infrastructure as Code (Bicep/Terraform)
* Frontend (JavaScript/Node.js, React, Blazor)

**What can you expect next?**


To ensure a fair recruitment process free from unconscious bias, we handle your application anonymously and do not accept cover letters. Please refrain from sending one, so that the selection is based solely on professional competencies. We expect the following steps in the recruitment process:

* Telephone screening with Talent Acquisition Partner, Karishma
* First interview with Hiring Manager, Jelena, and possibly, another future colleague.
* Technical Assessment (Code Assignment) and a Second interview with two future colleagues.
* Professional references

***Please note that for this specific job, we don´t provide any relocation or work permit sponsorship support.***

**Read more about how to become a** **Dustineer**

title: Software Developer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**

  

Are you a recent graduate or a Software Developer at the early stage of your career eager to build a rewarding career in technology. We are now looking for multiple Software Developers to strengthen our department as we are taking on new exiting challenges!

  

Here at Ericsson, we are on a mission to develop 5G and beyond - creating telecom solutions that empower billions of people worldwide. We are not just imagining the future, we are building it. Our department within Ericsson Packet Core consists of around 45 highly dedicated, self-motivated engineers who thrive in an environment of collaboration and creativity. Located in our lively office at Lindholmen in Gothenburg, we are a part of blending technical expertise with dedication to improving the world.

 **What You Will Do:**  

We are currently looking for Software Developers to join one of our three cross-functional teams and contribute to making our world-class telecom products even better. In this role you will work with feature development from initial study through implementation. The daily tasks will include developing code in C for our user plane, contributing to team deliveries, and solving challenges related to networking protocols and system design.  

  

In this role, you will develop your skills to design and build fast, efficient, and well-structured software that powers the world’s best user plane. Our microservices are deployed in a cloud environment, so you will gain hands-on experience with cloud technologies, containerized systems, and modern software tools such as Git and continuous integration pipelines. Together with your team you will challenge our ways of working and dive into advanced software challenges to push our technology forward, aiming to set new world records in mobile packet switching.

**Qualifications:**
-------------------

We are looking for people who are in the early stages of their careers. We seek individuals with the following merits;  

* Relevant academic background, such as BSc or MSc in Computer Science or similar.
* Strong programming skills primarily in low-level programming C (or similar, C++, Rust, Go).
* Experience with UNIX/Linux environments.
* Familiarity with modern development tools (Git), container and cloud technologies (Kubernetes, Cloud) and an interest in AI tools.
* Ability to analyze and solve complex technical problems independently.
* Datacom experience.
 **Softskills:**  

* Demonstrate a positive, creative, and proactive attitude with a strong eagerness to learn and grow alongside your team.
* Proactive problem-solving skills and being committed to continuous improvement and driving results.
* Ability to assess options quickly and decisively.
* Contribute to an open and communicative work environment.
* Ability to work constructively and in an agile way together with the team, always with a mindset that’s represents our Ericsson values.

  

**Why join us?**  

When working with us it's more about the craft as a system developer than knowing all the answers. We believe in the power of collaboration and embrace a team-first mindset to achieve excellence together. By joining the packet core crew you’ll grow, share ideas and build innovations that help people connect.  

**Please note: We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.****What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Göteborg

title: Fullstackutvecklare till ALTEN i Umeå
description:
Vi söker nu en skicklig **fullstackutvecklare** till ett spännande projekt inom utveckling och underhåll av förvaltningsbar och säker kod. Rollen innebär att arbeta i en avancerad miljö där teamarbete och tvärfunktionellt samarbete är centralt.


 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper. Du är kommunikativ och samarbetar gärna både i ditt eget team och tvärfunktionellt. Eftersom komponenterna används globalt behöver du ha goda kunskaper i engelska, både i tal och skrift. Viss förståelse för svenska är önskvärd.



Som utvecklare kommer du att arbeta med:

* Backendutveckling i **Java** och **Spring Boot**
* Frontendutveckling i **React** och **TypeScript**
* Utveckling av **webkomponenter** i **Lit Elements**
* Bygga **microfrontends** som använder webkomponenter

**Vi söker dig som har:**

* 5 års erfarenhet av utveckling inom frontend och backend
* Mycket goda kunskaper i **TypeScript** och **React**
* Erfarenhet av att utveckla **microfrontends**
* God erfarenhet av **Java / Spring Boot** i en **microservicearkitektur**
* Kunskap om tekniker som **Kafka, Kubernetes och Azure** (meriterande)
* Erfarenhet av **Lit** och **Redux** (meriterande)


Om ALTEN


ALTEN är ett av Europas största teknik- och IT-konsultföretag med över 57 000 anställda cirka 30 länder. Våra ingenjörer utför komplexa och mycket tekniska projekt genom hela produktutvecklingskedjan hos de främsta företagen inom flera olika branscher såsom Fordon, Försvar & Säkerhet, Energi, Industriell utrustning, Public service samt Life sciences. I Sverige är vi cirka 1300 engagerade medarbetare med 9 kontor i 9 städer – från Lund i söder till Skellefteå i norr.

  

ALTEN har för femte året i rad utsetts till en av Sveriges mest attraktiva arbetsgivare av Karriärföretagen, en utmärkelse för arbetsgivare som erbjuder unika karriär- och utvecklingsmöjligheter.

title: Fullstack Developer (Automotive) | Gothenburg | Hybrid Model
description:
Looking for Fullstack Developer positions? Keep reading!


ALTEN Sweden is currently seeking a skilled and motivated Fullstack Developer to join one of our key clients within the automotive sector. You will play a central role in building innovative solutions that enable connected services and data-driven applications.


WHAT DO WE OFFER?


As a consultant at ALTEN, you’ll have the opportunity to work on challenging and exciting projects with:

* Technical challenges and development opportunities.
* An inspiring community and the chance to contribute to a sustainable future.
* Supportive and coaching leadership.
* The possibility to work across various industries where our clients operate.
* A personal training budget for internal or external courses.



ABOUT THE ROLE


As a key member of our team, you will be responsible for developing a comprehensive portal equipped with advanced tools and applications tailored for a diverse user base. Your work will empower in-depth troubleshooting and data analysis across our microservices architecture for connected solutions.

  

Modality: hybrid, with 2–3 days working from home. Office located in Gothenburg.

  

What you will do:

* Develop both backend and frontend components for new tools and applications, following best practices and high standards.
* Deploy, operate, and maintain the portal and its backend services while continuously driving improvements in quality, functionality, and cost efficiency.
* Contribute to the design and evolution of new features, ensuring scalable, robust, and future-ready solutions.


WHO YOU ARE?


We are seeking candidates with a strong technical foundation, excellent problem-solving skills, and a genuine passion for technology. You should be a clear communicator, able to bridge technical and business needs, and thrive in a collaborative, team-oriented environment. Our ideal colleague is curious, driven, customer-focused, and embraces a “can-do” attitude to overcome challenges and deliver impactful results.

  

Your profile:

* 5+ years of professional experience as a Fullstack Developer, including personal or hobby projects that showcase your skills.
* You must have experience within the automotive industry.
* Proficiency in JavaScript, React, React Hooks, Redux, RTL queries, and TypeScript.
* Hands-on experience with microservices architecture.
* Solid understanding of integration architecture, including API gateways and APIs (REST, GraphQL).
* Strong background in Java 11 (at least), Spring Boot, JMS, RESTful APIs, and asynchronous server-side programming.
* Experience with databases such as MongoDB and PostgreSQL.
* Familiarity with AWS managed services (SNS, SQS, Lambda, and other AWS resources).
* Experience working in Agile environments (SCRUM or Kanban).
* Fluency in English, both written and spoken.


Nice-to-have (extra merits):

* University degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.
* Experience with DevOps practices and CI/CD pipelines.
* Knowledge of AI tools such as AWS Q and Copilot.


ABOUT ALTEN


ALTEN is one of Europe’s largest technology and IT consulting companies, with over 57,000 employees across approximately 30 countries. Our engineers carry out complex and highly technical projects throughout the entire product development chain for leading companies in several industries including Automotive, Defense & Security, Energy, Industrial Equipment, Public Sector, and Life Sciences.


In Sweden, we are approximately 1,300 dedicated employees spread across 9 offices in cities ranging from Lund in the south to Skellefteå in the north.


ALTEN has been named one of Sweden’s most attractive employers by Karriärföretagen for five consecutive years — an award for companies offering unique career and development opportunities.


Are you already imagining yourself joining our team? Good, because we can’t wait to hear from you.

*Building tomorrow’s world today!*

description:
Letar du efter en tjänst som Fullstackutvecklare? Fortsätt läsa!

  

ALTEN Sweden söker just nu en skicklig och motiverad Fullstackutvecklare till en av våra nyckelkunder inom fordonssektorn. Du kommer att spela en central roll i att bygga innovativa lösningar som möjliggör uppkopplade tjänster och datadrivna applikationer.

  

VAD ERBJUDER VI?


Som konsult på ALTEN får du möjlighet att arbeta med spännande och utmanande projekt som erbjuder:

* Tekniska utmaningar och utvecklingsmöjligheter.
* En inspirerande gemenskap och chansen att bidra till en hållbar framtid.
* Stöttande och coachande ledarskap.
* Möjlighet att arbeta inom olika branscher där våra kunder är verksamma.
* En personlig utbildningsbudget för interna eller externa kurser.



OM ROLLEN


Som en nyckelmedlem i vårt team kommer du att ansvara för att utveckla en omfattande portal utrustad med avancerade verktyg och applikationer anpassade för en mångsidig användarbas. Ditt arbete kommer att möjliggöra djupgående felsökning och dataanalys över vår mikrotjänstarkitektur för uppkopplade lösningar.

  

Arbetsmodell: hybrid, med 2–3 dagar arbete hemifrån. Kontoret är beläget i Göteborg.

  

Dina arbetsuppgifter:

* Utveckla både backend- och frontendkomponenter för nya verktyg och applikationer, enligt bästa praxis och höga standarder.
* Distribuera, driva och underhålla portalen och dess backend-tjänster samtidigt som du kontinuerligt förbättrar kvalitet, funktionalitet och kostnadseffektivitet.
* Bidra till design och vidareutveckling av nya funktioner, och säkerställa skalbara, robusta och framtidssäkra lösningar.


VEM ÄR DU?


Vi söker kandidater med stark teknisk grund, utmärkta problemlösningsförmågor och ett genuint intresse för teknik. Du bör vara en tydlig kommunikatör, kunna överbrygga tekniska och affärsmässiga behov och trivas i en samarbetande och teamorienterad miljö. Vår idealiska kollega är nyfiken, drivande, kundfokuserad och har en “can-do”-attityd för att övervinna utmaningar och leverera resultat.

  

Din profil:

* 5+ års professionell erfarenhet som Fullstackutvecklare, inklusive personliga eller hobbyprojekt som visar dina färdigheter.
* Erfarenhet inom fordonsindustrin är ett krav.
* Goda kunskaper i JavaScript, React, React Hooks, Redux, RTL queries och TypeScript.
* Praktisk erfarenhet av mikrotjänstarkitektur.
* Stark förståelse för integrationsarkitektur, inklusive API-gateways och API:er (REST, GraphQL).
* Gedigen bakgrund i Java 11 (minst), Spring Boot, JMS, RESTful APIs och asynkron server-side programmering.
* Erfarenhet av databaser såsom MongoDB och PostgreSQL.
* Vana vid AWS managed services (SNS, SQS, Lambda och andra AWS-resurser).
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i Agile-miljöer (SCRUM eller Kanban).
* Flytande i engelska, både i tal och skrift.


Meriterande (extra fördelar):

* Universitetsexamen i Software Engineering, Computer Science eller ett närliggande område.
* Erfarenhet av DevOps-praktiker och CI/CD-pipelines.
* Kunskap om AI-verktyg såsom AWS Q och Copilot.


OM ALTEN


ALTEN är ett av Europas största konsultföretag inom teknik och IT, med över 57 000 anställda i cirka 30 länder. Våra ingenjörer driver komplexa och tekniskt avancerade projekt genom hela produktutvecklingskedjan för ledande företag inom flera branscher, inklusive fordonsindustri, försvar & säkerhet, energi, industriutrustning, offentlig sektor och life sciences.


I Sverige är vi cirka 1 300 engagerade medarbetare fördelade på 9 kontor, från Lund i söder till Skellefteå i norr.


ALTEN har blivit utsedd till en av Sveriges mest attraktiva arbetsgivare av Karriärföretagen fem år i rad – en utmärkelse för företag som erbjuder unika karriär- och utvecklingsmöjligheter.


Ser du dig redan som en del av vårt team? Bra, för vi ser fram emot att höra från dig.


Vi bygger morgondagens värld redan idag!


  
Jobb detaljer
17/09/2025
Göteborg Stockholm
Rekrytering Kontakt
ALTEN Sweden
recruitment@alten.se

title: C++ Developer (ADAS)| Gothenburg
description:
Looking for C++ Developer positions? Keep reading!


ALTEN Sweden is currently seeking a skilled and motivated C++ Developer to join our dynamic team. You will work closely with different domains and be part of strategic technology transfers and platform integrations for national automotive operations.


WHAT DO WE OFFER?


As a consultant at ALTEN, you’ll have the opportunity to work on challenging and exciting projects with:

* Technical challenges and development opportunities.
* An inspiring community and the chance to contribute to a sustainable future.
* Supportive and coaching leadership.
* The possibility to work across various industries where our clients operate.
* A personal training budget for internal or external courses.



ABOUT THE ROLE


The role is based in Gothenburg and the work modality is 100% on-site.

  

What you will do:

* Design, develop, and optimize C++ software modules for ADAS applications (e.g., lane keeping, collision avoidance, adaptive cruise control, object detection).
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams (software, hardware, testing, systems engineers) to integrate ADAS functionalities into vehicle platforms.
* Work with real-time systems and embedded platforms (AUTOSAR, QNX, Linux).
* Implement and validate algorithms for sensor fusion, computer vision, and radar/lidar processing.
* Perform debugging, testing, and performance optimization of embedded software.
* Ensure compliance with automotive safety and quality standards (ISO 26262, ASPICE).
* Participate in code reviews, documentation, and continuous improvement of software development processes.

  

Who you are:

* Strong experience as a C++ Developer (C++11/14/17).
* Previous professional experience in ADAS projects within the automotive industry.
* Knowledge of embedded systems and real-time operating systems.
* Familiarity with AUTOSAR, CAN / LIN / Ethernet communication protocols.
* Experience with development tools such as Git, Jira, Jenkins, Vector tools (CANoe, CANalyzer).
* Knowledge of safety-critical software development (ISO 26262, ASPICE).
* Strong problem-solving skills and ability to work in international, multidisciplinary teams.
* Good communication skills in English (spoken and written).

  

About ALTEN


ALTEN is one of Europe’s largest technology and IT consulting companies, with over 57,000 employees across approximately 30 countries. Our engineers carry out complex and highly technical projects throughout the entire product development chain for leading companies in several industries including Automotive, Defense & Security, Energy, Industrial Equipment, Public Sector, and Life Sciences.

  

In Sweden, we are approximately 1,300 dedicated employees spread across 9 offices in cities ranging from Lund in the south to Skellefteå in the north.


ALTEN has been named one of Sweden’s most attractive employers by Karriärföretagen for five consecutive years — an award for companies offering unique career and development opportunities.

  

Are you already imagining yourself joining our team? Good, because we can´t wait to hear from you.

 *Building tomorrow´s world today!*

title: Fullstack Developer | Gothenburg
description:
Looking for Fullstack Developer positions? Keep reading!


ALTEN Sweden is currently seeking skilled and motivated Fullstack Developer to join our dynamic team. You will work closely with different domains and be part of strategic technology transfers and platform integrations for national defense operations.


WHAT DO WE OFFER?


As a consultant at ALTEN, you’ll have the opportunity to work on challenging and exciting projects with some of our key clients, with:

* Technical challenges and development opportunities.
* An inspiring community and the chance to contribute to a sustainable future.
* Supportive and coaching leadership.
* The possibility to work across various industries where our clients operate.
* A personal training budget for internal or external courses.


ABOUT THE ROLE


As a Senior FullStack Developer, you will be a key contributor in developing a comprehensive portal equipped with advanced tools and applications for a diverse user base. Your work will support in-depth troubleshooting and data analysis across our microservices architecture for connected solutions. **The role is based in Gothenburg and and the work mode is hybrid with 2-3 days of teleworking.**

  

What you will do:

* Develop backend and frontend components for new tools and applications, following best practices and ensuring high quality.
* Deploy, operate, and maintain the portal and its backend services, continuously improving quality, functionality, and cost efficiency.
* Contribute to the design of new features and functionalities, ensuring scalability and robustness.
* Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, translating business needs into technical solutions.
* Actively drive process improvements and foster a proactive development culture.

  

Who you are:

* Several years of professional experience as a Fullstack Developer, with personal or hobby projects as a plus.
* Proficiency in JavaScript, React, React Hooks, Redux, RTL queries, and TypeScript.
* Solid hands-on experience with microservices architecture.
* Strong background in Java, Spring Boot, JMS, RESTful APIs, and asynchronous server-side programming.
* Experience with MongoDB and PostgreSQL.
* Practical knowledge of integration architecture, including API gateways and APIs (REST, GraphQL).
* Familiarity with AWS managed services (Amazon SNS, SQS, Lambda, etc.).
* Experience working within Agile teams using SCRUM or Kanban methodologies.
* Fluent in English, both written and spoken. High Swedish level is a plus.

  

About ALTEN


ALTEN is one of Europe’s largest technology and IT consulting companies, with over 57,000 employees across approximately 30 countries. Our engineers carry out complex and highly technical projects throughout the entire product development chain for leading companies in several industries including Automotive, Defense & Security, Energy, Industrial Equipment, Public Sector, and Life Sciences.

  

In Sweden, we are approximately 1,300 dedicated employees spread across 9 offices in cities ranging from Lund in the south to Skellefteå in the north.


ALTEN has been named one of Sweden’s most attractive employers by Karriärföretagen for five consecutive years — an award for companies offering unique career and development opportunities.
